“loka sancharaka dinaya” adata (27) yedi thibe.“sancharaka karmanthaya ha jaiwa wiwidhathwaya” yanna themawa kara ganimin pawathwena loka sancharaka dinayata samagamiwa deshiya sancharakayan danumwath kirime ha akarshaniya sancharaka sthana sanwardhanaya kirime aramunin sancharaka prawardhana karyanshaya magin keti paniwida sewawakda aarambha kara atha.nawa wada satahana kriyawata nanwimath samanga merata werala thira, sanskruthika urumayath, wanajiwi kalapa, wishesha uthsawa, thrasajanaka krida, saundaryathmaka diya ali aadiya pilibanda thorathuru satahan kara ganimata haki wana athara me thulin methek handuna nogath aakarshaniya sancharaka sthanada handuna ganimata hakiwe.loka sancharaka dinaya nimiththen eeye (26) saha ada (27) diwayina pura wadasatahan rasak aarthika sanwardhana amathyanshaya magin kriyathmaka kara atha..
9	garu amathige kauthukagara sancharaya

sarala arthaya yam kisi brahmanayek papadharmayan bahara kota sitiyi da, krodhamana mul kotagena athi karana huhun shabda nadda, keles kahata nadda, sanwara karagath jiwithayakin yuthu we da, sathara marga gnyanayen niwanata path wuye da, niwan magehi hasiri awasan kale da, yamek thula lokaye kisi thaneka uthsannawa ena ragadi keles nadda, ohu ‘mama brahamanayek‘ yayi dharmayen kiyanne ya.
